Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Goals.CommonGoals

Class CommonGoal01

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Goals.CommonGoals.CommonGoal
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Goals.CommonGoals.CommonGoal01
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CommonGoal01 extends CommonGoal
This class represents the CommonGoals number 0 and 1 CommonGoal description: numberOfGroups groups each containing at least dim tiles of the same type. the tiles of one group can be different from those of another group

  • Constructor Details

    • CommonGoal01

      public CommonGoal01(int dim, int numberOfGroups)
      Constructor for common goals 0 and 1.
      Parameters:
      dim - The number of tiles of the same type that must be present in a group. Must be greater than 0.
      numberOfGroups - The number of groups that must be present in the bookshelf.

  • Method Details

    • countValidGroups

      public static int countValidGroups(int[][] flagMatrix, int dim)
      Counts the number of valid groups of tiles flagged in a "Flag Matrix".

      A valid group is a cluster of connected elements in the flag matrix that has a size equal to or greater than the specified dimension "dim".

      Parameters:
      flagMatrix - The flag matrix represented as a 2D array of integers. A value of 1 represents an element to be checked at a given iteration. A value of 0 represents a position to be skipped. A value of 2 represents an already counted tile.
      dim - The minimum dimension required for a group to be considered valid.
      Returns:
      The number of valid groups found in the flag matrix.

    • isAchieved

      public boolean isAchieved(Bookshelf bookshelf)
      Checks if the given bookshelf meets the achievement criteria.

      The method uses a flag matrix to identify and count valid groups of books based on their types. Each book type is iterated over, and a separate flag matrix is created to represent the presence of that book type. The flag matrix is populated based on the bookshelf's content, marking valid book positions with 1 and others with 0. The number of valid groups is counted using the countValidGroups method, and if it meets the required number, the achievement is considered achieved.

      Specified by:
      isAchieved in class CommonGoal
      Parameters:
      bookshelf - The bookshelf object to be checked for achievement.
      Returns:
      true if the achievement is achieved, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the bookshelf reference is null.

    • getGoalName

      public String getGoalName()
      Returns the name of the goal based on the specified dimension.

      If the dimension is 2, the method returns "CommonGoal0". If the dimension is 4, the method returns "CommonGoal1". For any other dimension, the method returns "Error".

      Specified by:
      getGoalName in class CommonGoal
      Returns:
      The name of the goal based on the dimension.

    • getGoalDescription

      public String getGoalDescription()
      Returns the description of the goal.

      The method generates a description based on the number of groups and tiles specified. The description states that there should be a certain number of groups, each containing at least the specified number of tiles of the same type. It also mentions that different groups may have tiles of different types.

      Specified by:
      getGoalDescription in class CommonGoal
      Returns:
      The description of the goal.

    • getGoalFileNumber

      public String getGoalFileNumber()
      Returns the file number associated with the goal based on the specified dimension.

      If the dimension is 4, the method returns "1". For any other dimension, the method returns "2".

      Specified by:
      getGoalFileNumber in class CommonGoal
      Returns:
      The file number associated with the goal based on the dimension.
